name: Hotpot for 1 (or more)
keywords: Hotpot, Chinese Hotpot, Single Serving Hotpot, Spicy Soup, Noodle Soup, Asian Cuisine, One-Pot Meal, Quick Dinner, Easy Recipe, Customizable Hotpot, Sichuan Hotpot, Homemade Hotpot, Comfort Food, Pork, Prawns, Wontons, Fish Balls, Tofu, Enoki Mushrooms, Pak Choy, Spicy Broth, Chili Oil, Chinese Black Vinegar, Ginger Garlic Broth
description: A quick and customizable single-serving hotpot featuring a savory and spicy broth made with a pre-made base, soy sauce, black vinegar, and crunchy chili oil. This one-pot meal is perfect for a satisfying dinner, allowing you to add your favorite ingredients like thinly sliced meats, seafood, wontons, tofu, fresh vegetables, and noodles.

recipeInstructions.text: Bring hotpot base ingredients to a boil.
recipeInstructions.name: Prep base

recipeInstructions.text: Add ingredients in order of cook time. Top with water as required. Once desired items cooked, take off the heat and top with sprouts and spring onions.
recipeInstructions.name: Prep base

notes: The add ins are all optional. They're a list of ones I enjoy. My core ones that I go for are the thinly sliced pork, puffed tofu, enoki mushrooms, wontons, noodles, pak choy, sprouts and spring onions.
